page.title: 06EDUCATION OWERSBY CHILDREN
page.content: There are no schools in this area and no playschools.Pre-school children at- tend the play-group run by mothers in the neighbouring village of Kirkby. Children of primary school age travel by bus to the nearest school which is in Osgodby.These children take packed lunches as no hot meals are available. From the age of 11 most children go to the comprehensive school about 7 miles away at Market Rasen.This school off- ers CSE & O & A level GCE courses and many extra-curricular activities. If parents so wish their children may sit a selection exam and if successful attend the grammar school at Caistor which is about 8 mls away. Normally parents are responsible for providing transport for children to Caistor. Various evening classes for adults are arranged in nearby villages and towns.
